All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Active
Represents the active pile in the Pokémon Trading Card Game, where the player's active Pokémon is placed.
Bench
Represents a bench in the Pokémon Trading Card Game, where the player's benched Pokémon are placed.
Bill
This class represents the Trainer card "Bill" in the Pokémon Trading Card Game.
Card
This class represents a generic card in the Pokémon Trading Card Game.
Deck
Represents the deck pile in the Pokémon Trading Card Game.
DeckBuilder
This class is responsible for building prebuilt decks.

This class represents a "Diglett" Pokémon card in the Pokémon Trading Card Game.
DiscardPile
Represents the discard pile in the Pokémon Trading Card Game, where the player's discarded cards are placed.

This class represents a "Double Colorless Energy" card in the Pokémon Trading Card Game.

This class represents a "Fire Energy" card in the Pokémon Trading Card Game.
Game
This class is responsible for setting up and managing the game flow of the Pokémon Trading Card Game emulation.

This class represents a "Grass Energy" card in the Pokémon Trading Card Game.

This class represents a "Growlithe" Pokémon card in the Pokémon Trading Card Game.
Hand
Represents the player's hand in the Pokémon Trading Card Game, where the player holds their cards.

This class represents a "Hitmonchan" Pokémon card in the Pokémon Trading Card Game.

This class runs the Pokémon Trading Card Game emulation.

This class provides helper methods for Pokémon cards in the Pokémon Trading Card Game.

This class represents a player in the Pokémon Trading Card Game.
